类 ArtifactDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ArtifactDownloader
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ArtifactDownloader
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Plays the role of downloading JAR files by using a http based fetcher.
    作者:
    Yizhong Ding

    • 构造器概要

      • ArtifactDownloader

        public ArtifactDownloader(okhttp3.OkHttpClient client,
                          FileWriter writer)
        Constructor of ArtifactDownloader taking an OkHttpClient and a FileWriter as parameters.
        参数:
        client - input client
        writer - input writer

    • 方法详细资料

      • download

        public long download(java.lang.String url,
                     java.lang.String path)
              throws ArtifactResolveException
        Performs the downloading responsibility to fetch the jar file located on a given maven library.
        参数:
        url - The URL of a maven library.
        path - The path of the target jar file in the maven library.
        返回:
        Returns the length written on the disk.
        抛出:
        ArtifactResolveException - throws exception if download fails.

      • getClient

        public okhttp3.OkHttpClient getClient()
        Getter for OkHttpClient
        返回:
        returns the OkHttpClient instance

      • getWriter

        public FileWriter getWriter()
        Getter for FileWriter
        返回:
        returns the FileWriter instance

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Automatically close the writer at the end of the life cycle of this class.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.lang.AutoCloseable
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
